A security framework is like a recipe book for keeping things safe. Just like a cookbook tells you step-by-step how to make cookies, these frameworks tell companies step-by-step how to protect their computers and data from bad guys.

In this lesson, we'll learn about security frameworks overview: nist csf and iso 27001 in a way that makes sense. We'll start simple, use real examples, and build your understanding step by step. By the end, you'll understand the core ideas and why they matter!
